attributes.action: Cross Country must continue to serve Whittlesea, March and Manea train stations!
attributes.additional_details:
As a disabled Whittlesey resident, without a car, I rely on public transport hugely. It is shocking & appalling that a train company can just remove our vital train services, which so many local people rely on.

I urge the Government to consider the social & economic impact of such cuts; at a time when the Government wants people to go back to work, school, & spend for economic recovery. Please do not cut us off from the cities. There are almost 40,000 people within these communities combined.
attributes.background:
The Fenland communities of Whittlesea (also known as Whittlesey) March, and Manea rely on public transport for travelling to work & school, as well as shopping & leisure. 

In the interests of our community & the economy; please do not allow Cross Country trains to remove our vital train services.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for train operators.
